title: Vanilla Cake
description: 6-layers of vanilla cake baked with colorful sugar confetti, filled & frosted with our signature retro-blue vanilla frosting. Available in 6 or 9 sizes.

title: Velvet Cake
description: Deep red, moist cake lightly flavored with cocoa, filled & topped with traditional cream cheese frosting. Available in 6 or 9 sizes.

title: Lemon Cake
description: Four layers of vanilla cake filled with fresh lemon curd, frosted with vanilla buttercream. Available in 6 or 9 sizes.

title: Coconut Cake
description: Vanilla cake layered with pineapple accented coconut filling & topped with fluffy coconut buttercream & shredded coconut. Available in 6 or 9 sizes.

title: Carrot Cake
description: Baked with pecans & golden raisins, layered with our unique “praline filling” & topped with traditional cream cheese frosting. Available in 6 or 9 sizes.

title: Lemonade Cupcake
description: Get ready to taste the ultimate summer treat: our Strawberry Lemonade Cupcake! Fresh strawberries folded into our vanilla cake batter giving it that irresistible fruity twist.

title: Strawberry Cupcake
description: Indulge in the deliciously sweet and tangy flavors of our Strawberry Cupcake! Made with a fluffy vanilla cupcake base, this irresistible treat is frosted with luscious strawberry buttercream

title: Mocha Cupcake
description: Moist chocolate cupcake made with semi-sweet chocolate chips, frosted with real coffee-infused buttercream. — $4.99 each

title: Peanut Cupcake
description: Delectable chocolate cupcake frosted with creamy peanut butter buttercream. — $8.99 each

title: Mint Cupcake
description: Rich chocolate cupcake made with semi-sweet chocolate chips, frosted with natural peppermint buttercream — $9.99 each

title: Chocolate Cupcake
description: Rich, dense chocolate cupcake topped with vanilla white buttercream. Made without gluten — $14 each

title: Gender Cupcake
description: Boy or Girl? Find out when you cut (or bite into) the cupcake! 4-box of cupcakes with your choice of SusiePink or SusieBlue buttercream on the inside.

title: Chocolate Icecream
description: Chocolate soft serve ice cream, caramel, chocolate sauce, brownie bits, chocolate cookie crumble

title: Vanilla Icecream
description: Vanilla soft serve ice cream, cream cheese icing, birthday cake bits, rainbow sprinkles

title: Coconut Icecream
description: Coconut soft serve ice cream, shredded toasted coconut, dark chocolate sauce

title: Cookies Icecream
description: Vanilla soft serve ice cream, Oreo cookies, chocolate chip cookies, Fudgee-o cookies, cookie dough chunks

title: Hazelnut Icecream
description: Chocolate soft serve ice cream, hazelnut-chocolate sauce, wafer cookies, Corn Flakes, toasted pistachios

title: Cotton Icecream
description: Vanilla soft serve ice cream, cotton candy, cotton candy sauce, rainbow sprinkles

title: Velvet Icecream
description: Vanilla soft serve ice cream, red velvet cake, cream cheese icing, raspberry sauce, red berry crumble

title: Peanut Icecream
description: Vanilla soft serve ice cream, peanut butter sauce, caramel sauce, chocolate peanut crumble, chocolate sauce
